alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 22 at 8:24PM CST until January 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...A winter storm system is approaching from the west and will bring 4 to 8 inches of snow to portions of the area. Locally higher amounts are possible. * WHERE...Northern Arkansas. * WHEN...Tuesday afternoon through early Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on dangerous travel conditions and possible power outages.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may affect travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
